function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mentions of serving and interacting with a neighborhood and people, potentially indicating close contact and interaction.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission if proper precautions are not taken.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene and safety protocols, use personal protective equipment, and limit close physical contact.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, UV disinfection technology, and air filtration systems.","People":"Employees, customers, and community members who interact with the individual.","Owner":"Local health authorities, business owners, and event organizers."},{"Description":"The mention of Maldives and international travel, indicating potential movement across borders and exposure to different disease ecosystems.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of exposure to new infectious agents and potential spread of diseases across different regions.","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel protocols, quarantine measures, and regular testing for infectious diseases.","Technologies":"Testing kits for infectious diseases, e-health passports, and thermal imaging systems.","People":"International travelers, hotel guests, and employees in the travel and hospitality industry.","Owner":"Government health agencies, travel companies, and hospitality management."}]}
